Blog.post: ok ok this is part two of my depression ever been depressed and u dont know y? ever felt like u cant make it another day? everything in my life is going crazy thats rl and net life ant doing to good either......... sometimes i wish i could run away and die and the worst part is i really dont have anyone to talk to about all my issuses when i try to open up they make it seem like my feelings are not real or like im putting my probs infront of theirs if only they knew that sometimes i i just feel like dying i just feel like becoming one with the ground oh well i need words of encouragment tonite can u give me some ppllssss

today's blog is about life today im kind of under the weather and everything around me seems to be fallin apart it seems as tho i cant pay to win i might be losing my best friend and i dont know wat to do to get it bac ever felt like u dont belong like u dont fit in u scared to move to the left or to the right for fear of failure or defeat afraid ull let everyone down tell me wat do u do in this times wats ur answer ight thats it for today ~1~

ok now its time to tell about me this is a post for my fans and as u can see i dont have many im a 26 yr old female with nothing betta to do then post comments and talk about bull ish sometimes i fell like its me against the world but like a famous person said the whole is a stage and we are the actors so i guess i must play the hell out of my part so when i died i have a award named after me i know im rambling but i hope is nothing else i get remeber as one who loved to love i dont knwo if u understand that but i do ok that is my post for today so holla bac ~1~

ok ok i have a there fam i knwo werid but its a family on there.com and my mom and dad just broke up its werid but i was really hurt by it and he is acting mean to me i dont understand y i ant do nothing i know i know its werid so tell me wat u think about having families on online games wats ur take on all this

ight this is day 3 ima try to have one everyday ok this is the topic for today online game dating like u know i played TSO (The sims online) and There.com so my question or my say is does online dating work and is it worth it if u dont take it out of game and if ur married or taken in rl (real life) y do u date in a game? and y get married in those game to wat does it benfit u just some questions for today ight holla

Omg ok lawd im doing another blog this one is about love yea yea that four letter word the one we hate so much but like so much at the same time ever felt like u luv someone so much but yet u know if u stay u might make it worst or u dont know if ur going to be true ever felt like ur heart might crack and ur scared to give it or how about u have someone but u might be fallin for someone else lol not saying i am but im saying this is the things luv have u doing like wondering if its real or if its fake (u know the lust thing) or wat about the feelings u have and the not wanting to get hurt its easier to put a wall up if u know wat i mean but hey do ur thing and leave a comment let me know wat u feel ight ~1~
